project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that presents the user with multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays the score at the end of the game. The questions and answers will be stored within the code itself.

task.name: Implement the data structure for questions and answers
Develop the quiz logic to present questions and capture user input
Implement the scoring mechanism to keep track of correct answers
Display the final score to the user at the end of the quiz
Write tests for the quiz game to ensure that the logic functions as intended
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
